core_meaning: Sextile between Pluto and Jupiter opens opportunity/skill. Pluto: . Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

hi.title: Pluto Sextile Jupiter (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Pluto और Jupiter का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
